H0.text: The words: 'It's the thrill of the fight. Rising up to the challenge of our rival ‘ are from which pop hit. We Will Rock You (Queen)

H1.text: The words: 'It's the thrill of the fight. Rising up to the challenge of our rival ‘ are from which pop hit. Don't Stop Believin' (Journey)

H2.text: The words: 'It's the thrill of the fight. Rising up to the challenge of our rival ‘ are from which pop hit. Jump (Van Halen)

H3.text: The words: 'It's the thrill of the fight. Rising up to the challenge of our rival ‘ are from which pop hit. EYE OF THE TIGER (Survivor)

A4.text: The chorus contains the line 'Rising up to the spirit of our rival'.
